SA11sanss01u:5: tīvraṃ punaḥ punar anantam aśāntacittais tac chrotum ādaram udārataraṃ bhajadhvam //
SA11sanss01u:6: śrutvā ... pāpaṃ anuddhatâtmā pūrvârjitaṃ ca vipulaṃ kṣapayaty aśeṣam /
SA11sanss01u:7: aprāptapūrvam api saukhyam avāpnuvanti hāniṃ sukhāc ca na kadācid api prayānti //
SA11sanss01u:8: sambodhisatvasukham uttamam akṣaya ... apy asamasaṃpadam āpnuvanti /
SA11sanss01u:9: tad dharmaratnam atidurlabham apy alabdhaṃ labdhakṣaṇāḥ
SA11sanss01u:11: āyāntu ca tribhuvanâikahitasya vākyaṃ śrotuṃ prasannamanasaḥ
SA11sanss01u:15: sugatān sasutān sadharmakāyān praṇipatyâdarato 'khilāṃś ca vandyān /
SA11sanss01u:18: na ca kiñcid apūrvam atra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgranthanakauśalaṃ mamâsti /
SA11sanss01u:19: atâiva na me parârthayatnaḥ svamano bhāvayituṃ mamêdam
SA11sanss01u:21: mama tāvad anena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:22: yadi matsamadhātur eva paśyed aparo 'py enam ato 'pi sârthako 'yam //
SA11sanss01u:27: ntyate hitaṃ punar apy eṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ //
SA11sanss01u:30: durlabhâṣṭākṣaṇanirvṛttir durlabho manuṣyapratilambho durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpatviśuddhir durlabho buddhôtpādo /
SA11sanss01u:37: durlabhaḥ saddharme tadanukūlaḥ prayatno manuṣyalokae iti //
SA11sanss01u:40: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca na priyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:41: tadâtmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yat taṃ rakṣāmi nêtaram /
SA11sanss01u:44: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matir dṛḍhā //
SA11sanss01u:46: śraddhayamānu jinān jinadharmmān śraddhayate cari buddhasutānām /
SA11sanss01u:47: bodhi anuttara śraddhayamāno jāyati cittaṃ mahāpuruṣāṇām //
SA11sanss01u:74: te tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajanti /
SA11sanss01u:75: ye tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajantī /
SA11sanss01u:97: ye sadâdhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhis teṣûpapadyati bodhayi cittam /
SA11sanss01u:105: ye sada pāramitāsu carantī te pratipannêho mahayāne /
SA11sanss01u:106: ye pratipannêho mahayāne te pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān //
SA11sanss01u:107: ye pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān teṣu anusmṛti buddhâbhedyā /
SA11sanss01u:111: teṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ //
SA11sanss01u:112: yeṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ teṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmmaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:114: yeṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmaḥ te sada dhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhir /
SA11sanss01u:121: ye tu śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyās te imi śraddadhi hetubalena //
SA11sanss01u:123: nôta tu tādṛśu puṇyaviśeṣo yādṛśa śraddadhato imi dharmmān //
SA11sanss01u:126: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena niryānti nāyakāḥ /
SA11sanss01u:128: aśrāddhasya manuṣyasya śuklo dharmo na rohati /
SA11sanss01u:132: śraddhāyām ānanda yogaḥ karaṇīyêdaṃ tathāgato vijñapayatîti //
SA11sanss01u:137: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kartavyaṃ sarvapuṇyasaṃgrahatvāt tad yathâryasiṃhaparipṛcchāyāṃ /
SA11sanss01u:146: eṣa saṃgraha dharmāṇāṃ bhavate tena ca priyaḥ //
SA11sanss01u:167: iti hi kulaputra bodhicittam ebhiś cânyaiś câpramāṇair guṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgatam iti //
SA11sanss01u:187: jayamateś ca bodhisatvasya pṛthivī vidāram adāt /
SA11sanss01u:189: sa hi śūnyatāṃ nâdhimuktavān śūnyatāvādini ca pratighaṃ kṛtavān //
SA11sanss01u:196: sa paśuratham abhiruhya mārgaṃ pratipadyate sa cireṇa dīrgheṇâdhvanā yojanaśataṃ gacchet /
SA11sanss01u:197: sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu pu-
SA11sanss01u:200: tat kiṃ śaknuyāt sa puruṣas tān lokadhātūn paśurathenâtikramitum /
SA11sanss01u:201: yāvad anabhilāpyânabhilāpyair api kalpair ekam api lokadhātum
SA11sanss01u:206: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścid bodhicittam utpādya mahāyānaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:211: śrāvakayānaṃ ca paṭhati svâdhyāyati mīmāṃsate paribudhyate 'rthāṃś ca pāṭhayati yāvad bodhayati /
SA11sanss01u:214: yad api tasya bodhisatvasya bodhibhāvanâtaḥ prajñêndriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ tad api tasya dhanvīkriyate pratihanyate /
SA11sanss01u:216: tad evam eṣā śūnyatânadhimuktir mahāyānânabhiratiś câsaṃpūrṇâdhimukticittacaryasyâpi prāyo na saṃdṛśyate /
SA11sanss01u:224: na câtrêcchayā kiñcid viśeṣacihnaṃ nītârthaṃ karttuṃ labhyate /
SA11sanss01u:247: yathā na te tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nâsti tyāgêti /
SA11sanss01u:248: evam ihânyabodhicittanindā draṣṭavyā na tu bodhicittam anyathā
SA11sanss01u:251: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo gotrasthaḥ sann anutpāditabodhicittaḥ
SA11sanss01u:256: saṃbodher vā bodhicittasya vā varṇaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:257: sa satvā ... naśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya
SA11sanss01u:258: yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittôtpādāya /
SA11sanss01u:260: utpādyânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ caturthaṃ kāraṇam iti /
SA11sanss01u:261: tac ca bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca
SA11sanss01u:264: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te satvāḥ sarvaloke ye 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
SA11sanss01u:265: tato 'pi durlabhatamās te satvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
SA11sanss01u:268: mayā buddhena bhavitavyam iti cittaṃ praṇidhānād utpannaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss01u:271: kaḥ punar vādaḥ kiñcid eva kuśalaṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanss01u:278: evaṃ vidyutpradīpo nāma tathāgato yatra yaśasā tathāgatena
SA11sanss01u:281: evam anantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrârciṣmatā tathāgatena
SA11sanss01u:284: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa
SA11sanss01u:285: tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ dattakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenêty ādi //
SA11sanss01u:289: tad yathâpi nāma kulaputra cittam api vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇâlaṃkāram abhibhavati /
SA11sanss01u:292: evam eva kulaputrâśayapratipattibhinnam api sarvajñatācittôtpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇâlaṃkāram abhibhavati bodhisattvanāma ca na vijahāti /
SA11sanss01u:294: itaś ca vinâpi caryayā bodhicittam upakārakam iti jñātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:296: yasmāc ca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:298: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ /
SA11sanss01u:300: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ mahārājâivam eva samyaksambodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ tra ... praṇidhiṃ ca gacchann api tiṣṭhann api
SA11sanss01u:306: ātmanaś câtītânāgatapratyutpannāni sarvakuśalamūlāny abhisaṃkṣipya tulayitvā piṇḍayitvânumodasvâgrayânumodanayā
SA11sanss01u:313: sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayâivaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ
SA11sanss01u:314: san rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasi rājyakṛtyāni ca na hāyayiṣyasi
SA11sanss01u:317: sa khalu punas tvaṃ mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlakarmaṇo-
SA11sanss01u:321: sarvāsu ca devamanuṣyôpapattiṣv ādhipatyam eva kārayasi /
SA11sanss01u:322: na ca tāvat tava mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittasya
SA11sanss01u:324: api ca mahārājâikam api samyaksaṃbodhicittaṃ sarvasattvôttāraṇârambaṇatvāt sarvasatvâmocanârambaṇatvāt
SA11sanss01u:334: na ca kañcit satkārāṃ kasyacit sakāśāt pratikāṃkṣaty anyatra
SA11sanss01u:347: śrāvakayānam evâsya na bhavati prāg eva mahāyānam iti /
SA11sanss01u:355: evam ādi sūtreṣu bhūmipraviṣṭasyâpi śikṣāprajñaptir dṛśyate /
SA11sanss01u:356: yatra vâsāmānyena bodhisatvam adhikṛtyôpadeśas tatrâbhyāsayogyatayā pratiṣedhavākyena vâdikarmikabodhisatvena na
SA11sanss01u:362: na câtra śithilena bhavitavyaṃ na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati /
SA11sanss01u:364: ayaṃ ca saṃvaraḥ strīṇām api mṛdukleśānāṃ bodhyabhilāṣacittānāṃ labhyate /
SA11sanss01u:370: iha śāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādyârabdhavīryo viharati
SA11sanss01u:376: hy asya śikṣâtikrame tīvram apatrāpyaṃ guruvisaṃvādanabhayaṃ côtpadyate /
SA11sanss01u:379: atâiva bodhisatvāḥ tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ śikṣāṇām anyatamaśikṣāniṣpattikāmāḥ samādānaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanss01u:380: tasya ca kalyāṇamitrasyâbhāve daśadigavasthitabuddhabodhisatvâbhimukhībhāvabhāvanayā saṃvaro grāhyaḥ saṃvaram
SA11sanss01u:382: anyathā tu sarvabuddhabodhisatvāḥ sadevakaś ca loko visaṃvāditaḥ syāt /
SA11sanss01u:383: saddharmasmṛtyupasthānasūtre hi kiñcin mātraṃ cintayitvâpy adadataḥ pretagatir uktā pratijñātaṃ câdadato narakagatiḥ /
SA11sanss01u:384: kiṃ punar anuttaram artham akhilasya jagataḥ pratijñāyâsaṃpādayataḥ /
SA11sanss01u:390: tatra kulaputra katamat satyaṃ yad bodhisatvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya tac cittaṃ jīvitahetor api na
SA11sanss01u:393: yat punar bodhisatvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya
SA11sanss01u:394: paścāt tac cittaṃ parityajati satveṣu vipratipadyate 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya pratikṛṣṭo mṛṣāvādêti /
SA11sanss01u:396: syād yathâpi nāma sāgaramate rājā vā rājamātro vā sarvaṃ nāgarakaṃ janaṃ śvo bhaktenôpanimantryôpekṣako bhaven nânnapānaṃ samudānayet satyaṃ sarvajanakāyaṃ visaṃvādayet /
SA11sanss01u:398: evam eva sāgaramate yo bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvān āśvāsyâtīrṇatāraṇāyâmuktamocanāyânāśvastâśvāsanāya yāvan na
SA11sanss01u:399: bāhuśrutye 'bhiyogaṃ karoti nâpi tato 'nyeṣu bodhipakṣyakuśalamūleṣu dharmeṣu /
SA11sanss01u:405: durlabhās te yajñasvāmino ye mahāyajñaṃ pratijñāyôttārayanti /
SA11sanss01u:406: tasmāt tarhi sāgaramate na sā bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā
SA11sanss01u:410: punar aparaṃ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ kenacid evâdhīṣṭo bhavati dharmeṣv arthakaraṇīyeṣu /
SA11sanss01u:411: tatra bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitā bhavati yāvad ātmaparityāgo 'pi
SA11sanss01u:412: bodhisatvena kartavyo bhavet tatra na punaḥ sa satvo visaṃvādayitavyêti /
SA11sanss01u:417: na punar yo 'ntaśâikam api yāvajjīvaṃ kuśalaṃ karmapathaṃ na
SA11sanss01u:418: rakṣati atha ca punar evaṃ vadati /
SA11sanss01u:420: sa pudgalaḥ paramakuhako mahāmṛṣāvādikaḥ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ purato visaṃvādako lokasyôcchedavādī
SA11sanss01u:421: sa mūḍhaḥ kālaṃ kurute vinipātagāmī bhavatîti /
SA11sanss01u:422: yāvat kālaṃ ca śaknoti tāvat kālaṃ kuśalaṃ samādāya
SA11sanss01u:426: api prajñayâvagāhyôtsahatae eva sakaladuṣkhitajanaparitrāṇadhuram avavoḍhuṃ tena vandanapūjanapāpadeśanapuṇyânumodanabuddhâdhyeṣaṇayācanabodhipariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā
SA11sanss01u:439: nimantraye jagat sarvaṃ dāridryān mocitâsmi tat //
SA11sanss01u:441: adyâgre na kariṣyāmi bodhiṃ prāpsyāmi yāvatā /
SA11sanss01u:447: nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi daśa dikṣu ca viśrutaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:451: na câtra sārvakālikāt saṃvaragrahaṇāj janmântarâpattiśaṅkā kartavyâtrâiva sūtre 'kṣobhyapraṇidhānânujñānād evaṃ hy uktaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:455: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyur yadi sarvasyāṃ jātau na
SA11sanss01u:458: anyās tu jātīr ābodheḥ sâiva saṃśodhayiṣyatîty ukteḥ //
SA11sanss01u:461: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasyāṃ jātau pravrajaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vâvaśyaṃ gṛhâvāsān niṣkrāmati /
SA11sanss01u:463: paramo hy ayaṃ śāriputra lābho yad uta gṛhâvāsān niṣkramaṇam iti /
SA11sanss01u:466: yathā janmântareṣv ayaṃ doṣo na bhavati tathâtrâiva
SA11sanss01u:469: tad evaṃ samāttasaṃvarasya sāmānyam āpattilakṣaṇam ucyate /
SA11sanss01u:470: yenâpattilakṣaṇena yuktaṃ vastu svayam apy utprekṣya
SA11sanss01u:486: sāmānyapāpadeśanā na ... vāt tu tato muktiḥ //
SA11sanss01u:498: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣi ... bhiḥ /
SA11sanss01u:511: yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:512: tatra maitreya yêmāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipen nâitāni
SA11sanss01u:518: yaḥ punar etad abhyāsârthaṃ vyutpāditam icchati /
SA11sanss01u:522: yaś ca mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo gaṃgānadīvālikāsamāni
SA11sanss01u:525: dahyād evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād /
SA11sanss01u:526: yo vânyo mañjuśrīr bodhisatvêmān evaṃrūpān dharmān
SA11sanss01u:531: so 'śikṣito 'pi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'syāṃ śikṣyāyāṃ chandiko vatataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanss01u:532: na tv eva tad dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastv iti /
SA11sanss01u:533: tasmād evam anuśaṃsadarśinā bodhisatvena na kathaṃcin nivarttitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:535: tatra mañjuśrīr ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamâṇurajaḥsamāḥ satva-s teṣām ekâikaḥ satvo rājā bhavej jambūdvīpâdhipatis te sarvae evaṃ ghoṣayeyuḥ /
SA11sanss01u:540: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvâivam ucyamāno nô trasyati na
SA11sanss01u:550: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na
SA11sanss01u:551: kupyati na ruṣyati na khila doṣacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss01u:569: kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvā bodhisatvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti /
SA11sanss01u:571: na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanss01u:572: kiṃ tarhi yānîmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrânteṣu
SA11sanss01u:577: tasmād asmadvidhena mandabuddhinā durvijñeyo vistarôktatvād bodhisatvasya saṃvaraḥ /
SA11sanss01u:580: katamāni ca tāni marmasthānāni yāni hi sūtrânteṣu
SA11sanss01u:588: yo bodhisatvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtena
SA11sanss01u:594: ātyayikaṃ parigṛhyâitad api me varjayan niṣīdāmîti /
SA11sanss01u:604: ksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya nântarā śravakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ devaputra prathamam
SA11sanss01u:607: mātsaryacittena sārddhaṃ sa nyasatîdaṃ devaputra dvitīyam
SA11sanss01u:609: sarvasatvā mayā trātavyêty evaṃ cittam utpādya nântarā
SA11sanss01u:611: anutpannâniruddhān sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam
SA11sanss01u:614: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nântarā tiṣṭhati na viṣṭhīvati
SA11sanss01u:615: aprāptāyāṃ sarvajñatāyām idaṃ devaputra pañcamam ānantaryam iti //
SA11sanss01u:621: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye 'smin pūtike samyag /
SA11sanss01u:627: ye kecit satvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahas tatra
SA11sanss01u:640: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:644: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:645: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam /
SA11sanss01u:650: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:661: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpadyate
SA11sanss01u:662: tathânyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:671: yo 'ham asyârthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyôddhuratād gatvâsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpādayāmi /
SA11sanss01u:673: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathâsya
SA11sanss01u:681: nêha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā /
SA11sanss01u:683: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:686: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanakôpasaṃkramya
SA11sanss01u:690: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam
SA11sanss01u:695: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ câinaṃ tyakṣyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:696: etac ca vastu parityajyâhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi
SA11sanss01u:697: etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
SA11sanss01u:698: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca
SA11sanss01u:700: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum /
SA11sanss01u:701: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:711: mā paritāpsīs tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye /
SA11sanss01u:718: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatrâprasādo bodhisatve vā
SA11sanss01u:720: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ anavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cêdaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ //
SA11sanss01u:722: catvārême śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante /
SA11sanss01u:730: yasyême śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa
SA11sanss01u:735: saṃkleśadharmo vatâyaṃ lokâmiṣaguruko vatâyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatâyam iti /
SA11sanss01u:736: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti /
SA11sanss01u:759: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe nôtsarjanacittam
SA11sanss01u:760: utpādayen na sa parivārôpādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya parigrahabuddhir utpadyate /
SA11sanss01u:761: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam
SA11sanss01u:762: upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastûpādātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:764: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâivaṃ cittam
SA11sanss01u:768: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat
SA11sanss01u:769: kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi
SA11sanss01u:770: satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastârthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādârthikebhyo netraṃ netrârthikebhyo dāsyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:771: māṃsaṃ māṃsârthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitârthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjârthikebhyo 'ṅgapratyaṅgāny aṅgapratyaṅgârthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śirorthikebhyaḥ parityakṣyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:772: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta
SA11sanss01u:774: api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati
SA11sanss01u:775: tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi /
SA11sanss01u:784: tad yathâpi nāma kula-putra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā
SA11sanss01u:785: hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ tvaktaḥ patrato vā
SA11sanss01u:787: puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya nâivaṃ bhavati
SA11sanss01u:789: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti //
SA11sanss01u:790: api tu khalu punar avikalpâiva hīnamadhyôtkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati /
SA11sanss01u:791: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñôtpādayitavyā
SA11sanss01u:792: yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenârthaḥ tat tad eva me
SA11sanss01u:796: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu
SA11sanss01u:798: tad yathâpi nāmêmāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni
SA11sanss01u:801: nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ satvānāṃ nānôpabhogaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanss01u:802: evam evâham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām
SA11sanss01u:819: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃdarśayamānaḥ anuttarasukhôpadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ
SA11sanss01u:822: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ ... sarvajagatsthityātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanss01u:827: sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:833: dhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇôdyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanss01u:852: svaśarīrânadhyavasitasantānaḥ aniketasarvabuddhadharmânusmṛtivihāry- asārāc charīrāt sārâdānâbhiprāyêti hi
SA11sanss01u:853: bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā
SA11sanss01u:859: adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryôpacārāṃ /
SA11sanss01u:860: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru /
SA11sanss01u:861: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi
SA11sanss01u:871: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ
SA11sanss01u:891: gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrān majjāmāṃsaṃ yathā
SA11sanss01u:896: sarvabodhisatvasamatôpāttair mahādānârambhair manasâkāṅkṣitaiḥ sarvayācakair ananutāpyacittair dānavastubhiḥ
SA11sanss01u:912_1: sarvajñatāsaṃbhāraṃ saṃbharamāṇaḥ praṇidhim ariñcan so 'tra yakṛtbukkāphupphuṣaṃ
SA11sanss01u:914: prasannaprītyākārair netrair bodhisatvaniryātena premṇâvyutthitamanasikāreṇa tyāgenâsārāt kāyāt
SA11sanss01u:920: yadi câham etadyācanakasyâitaccharīrād antraṃ yakṛtbukkāphuṣphuṣaṃ dadyāṃ /
SA11sanss01u:929: svamāṃsān nakhaṃ parityajann eva tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayatîty ātmabhāvôtsargaṃ kṛtvā //
SA11sanss01u:931: iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyânyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu
SA11sanss01u:937: mayâiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyâbhaviṣyata yena yuṣmākam āgamanaklamo na syāt /
SA11sanss01u:940: snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayôpakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati /
SA11sanss01u:964: ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā
SA11sanss01u:966: paṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvâlaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathârhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan
SA11sanss01u:967: putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vâpasṛjan /
SA11sanss01u:969: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān
SA11sanss01u:970: kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān
SA11sanss01u:976: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:981_0: yāvan nānābhājanāni vividhasaṃbhārāṇy anekakāṃsyapātrīr aprameyasaṃbhārôpacitā hiraṇyasuvarṇarūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇās
SA11sanss01u:981_1: tāni buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dadāno 'cintyadakṣiṇīyâdhimuktacetā bodhisatvaratnebhyo vā dadānaḥ /
SA11sanss01u:1004: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ
SA11sanss01u:1010: dhisatvaguneṣu pratipadyamāno 'bhijātabodhisatvâdhyāśayān pariśodhayamāno yāvad iti hi
SA11sanss01u:1019: evaṃ yāvad iti hi bodhisatvaś chatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan
SA11sanss01u:1028_1: anapekṣacitto dadānaḥ parityajann avasṛjann anuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā satvasārebhyo
SA11sanss01u:1031: bhyo vâbhijātabodhisatvadharmabhāṇakebhyo vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vā saṃgharatne
SA11sanss01u:1033: sarvabuddhaśāsane vā yāvat sarvapratigrāhakebhyaḥ sâivaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati //
SA11sanss01u:1034: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣûpadiṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanss01u:1041: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanss01u:1042: anenâhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya /
SA11sanss01u:1081: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān
SA11sanss01u:1083: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran /
SA11sanss01u:1084: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike
SA11sanss01u:1092: mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca
SA11sanss01u:1107: yena ca sukhôpadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatās tatsukhôpadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyur iti //
SA11sanss01u:1115: sarvasatvāḥ sarvarasâgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittā grahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacittanaprayuktāḥ
SA11sanss01u:1189: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrâtyāgacittânutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtânupālanatayā /
SA11sanss01u:1208: mā bhūt tan mama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānakauśalyaṃ vā
SA11sanss01u:1213: kuśalānāṃ ca cittacaitasikānānām anusmṛtir anusmṛtya ca
SA11sanss01u:1217: ye me utpatsyante kuśalāś cittôtpādās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmiṣyāmîtîdam anāgatakauśalyaṃ //
